official-title.#text: To enhance the ability of community financial institutions to foster economic growth and serve their communities, boost small businesses, increase individual savings, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives May 6, 2014.

header.#text: Changes required to small bank holding company policy statement on assessment of financial and managerial factors

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall publish in the Federal Register proposed revisions to the Small Bank Holding Company Policy Statement on Assessment of Financial and Managerial Factors (12 CFR Part 225 Appendix C) that provide that the policy shall apply to bank holding companies and savings and loan holding companies which have pro forma consolidated assets of less than $1,000,000,000 and that—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System

text.#text: Before the end of the 6-month period beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act, the
are not engaged in any nonbanking activities involving significant leverage; and
do not have a significant amount of outstanding debt that is held by the general public.

quote.#text: or small savings and loan holding company

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 171(b)(5)(C) of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:171/ss:b/p:5/sp:C

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to exclude a bank holding company or a savings and loan holding company from the policy statement described under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , if such action is warranted for supervisory purposes.

text.#text: Nothing in this Act or the amendments made by this Act may be construed as limiting the authority of the

term.#tail: has the meaning given that term under

term.#tail: has the meaning given that term under
